products.title: Spectrum, Zombie - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a unique name to match an equally unique hue, the spectrum zombie offers a cappuccino beige with a discreet satin finish, and blends it beautifully with deceptively sturdy slats, which are formed from a heavy gauge aluminium and complemented by matching fittings. Mix the zombie with navy blues in the home office, for a cool, contemporary feel that will get you working hard in no time. Or make this blind a feature all its own by setting it against off-white walls and accenting with pretty golds.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: True to its name, the ecowood in penthouse satin offers the look and feel of true penthouse luxury. A soft, creamy caramel, with the smoothest of textures, it offers an understated style that is often so hard to achieve. Not anymore. Use the penthouse satin in a contemporary bedroom, where creams, coffees, and golds rule the roost. Add in plenty of plush fabrics to provide a feeling of luxe and comfort, using coffee browns and glistening golds as light accents around the room.

products.title: Spectrum, Eminence - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum eminence comes in a gorgeous pinky purple and invokes a feeling of lively romance. The satin finish aluminium slats can be easy tilted and drawn to reveal the great outdoors whenever you need some light and air. A traditional all-pink colour scheme would benefit from the boldness of the eminence, which could serve as a fantastic starting point for the dcor of a guest or child's bedroom.

products.title: Spectrum, Hide - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the ability to either hide or stand out according to your preference, this neutral cappuccino shade from the spectrum range brings with it a subtle sophistication and timeless neutrality. Movable slats make it easy for you to control the light entry at will, and are quick and easy to clean. Settle the hide amongst deeper chocolate browns to provide an effective colour break in a cosy living room or bedroom; or use as a soft but most definitely there feature amongst cream or white walls in the dining room or home office.

products.title: Spectrum, Christi - Venetian Blind
products.description: A colourful yet unobtrusive window covering, the spectrum christi offers a country feel with a contemporary twist. Accented by coordinating fittings, this lightweight yet durable aluminium blind makes a homely feature in any part of the house. Use the christi in the kitchen for a country chic look, complemented by rustic woods, cream units, and pretty checks or florals. Alternatively, hang in your bathroom against pure white walls for a natural yet refreshing feel, easily accented by silver fixtures, fittings, and accessories.

products.title: Spectrum, Madang - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a contemporary, mint green hue that will refresh your room and soothe your mind, the spectrum madang has a relaxing, clean look that exudes calm and tranquillity, whether the slats left open or kept closed. The madang will sit comfortably against white walls in the bathroom, utility room, or en-suite, offering an unbeatable serenity. Or use as part of a fresh, pretty colour scheme in the master or guest bedroom, pairing with the softest of pinks for romance and wistfulness.

products.title: Spectrum, Log Cabin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in log cabin looks and feels strong and sturdy. The lightweight yet hardy metal slats have a contemporary, functional feel, and can be adjusted to your liking using the matching pull-cords that accompany the blind. Complement rich creams by placing this grey-tinted brown in your living room, for a cosy yet outdoorsy feel. Accent with deep forest greens or bright limes to really bring out the best in this brilliantly functional blind that will serve you year after year.

products.title: Spectrum, Selago - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in selago boasts pretty, icy blue aluminium slats that sit neatly in rows, and are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy. This blind can be used as a key feature or as a beautiful accent to stronger, deeper colours. For a cool, tranquil look in your kitchen, combine the selago with white walls, units, and tiles, and accenting sky blue or navy accessories. Or place in the nursery, where soft, soothing colours are a must, and gentle whites will complement it perfectly.

products.title: Spectrum, San Tropez - Venetian Blind
products.description: A muted shade of dark blue and a satin-finish aluminium work together to create the spectrum in san tropez, which is made up of neat, tilting slats that are easily moveable, allowing for quick and easy adjustments to suit. Break up dove grey walls by making a feature of the san tropez in an industrial-feel kitchen or dining room, where cool efficiency is fundamental. Or why not add to a teenager's room to combine fun and sophistication, easily complemented by silvers or whites? Spectrum, san tropez - venetian blind a muted shade of dark blue and a satin-finish aluminium work together to create the spectrum in san tropez, which is made up of neat, tilting slats that are easily moveable, allowing for quick and easy adjustments to.

products.title: Spectrum, San Marino - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum blind in san marino is a cool grey-blue, and is perfect for ultra-fashionable industrial looks in your home. Given the heavy gauge aluminium that it's made with, this blind has a surprisingly lightweight feel, and offers a smooth, satin finish and colour-matching trims. This is the ideal window covering for cool grey home office, where it will complement greys, blues, and greens alike.

products.title: Spectrum, London Hue - Venetian Blind
products.description: The dark, dusky shade of the spectrum's london hue has a rustic, country feel, yet could easily fit in with a more contemporary style. Satin-finished aluminium slats form the foundation of this blind, and even with such an unusual shade, you'll find the pull-cords and rails are perfectly colour-matched. Add depth and atmosphere to a country kitchen with shaker-style units and pretty creams and florals, which will offset the london hue beautifully.

products.title: Spectrum, Shingle Fawn - Venetian Blind
products.description: The shingle fawn from the spectrum range brings a creamy brown hue that will remind you off luxury milk chocolate, an effect accentuated by its subtle satin finish. Use it to control the light coming into your home, by adjusting the pull-cord to move the aluminium slats accordingly. Settle the shingle fawn amongst rich creams and pale taupes for a harmonised colour scheme that will work beautifully in any part of the home, and particularly the living room or kitchen.

products.title: Spectrum, Hawaiian Tan - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in hawaiian tan is comprised of heavy gauge aluminium slats in a deep orange colour, making it both prominent in appearance, and practical and easily workable. Gently tilt the slats using the matching orange pull-cord to allow the light to seep through, or close again to keep it out - it's just that simple. Place the hawaiian tan in a retro, industrial styled kitchen, accented by plenty of metallics and some funky wall art.

products.title: Spectrum, Rajah - Venetian Blind
products.description: Just a touch lighter than a model apricot, the spectrum rajah offers a gentler, more discreet tone, beautifully complemented by the soft satin finish of the sturdy aluminium slats. Take control of the light in your room using the colour-matched cords to tilt the slats up and down. Place this durable blind in the dining room, amongst soft chiffon whites and richer peach tones, for a gorgeous romantic dcor scheme that will keep the room's atmosphere light and airy.

products.title: Spectrum, Marsh Land - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a matt satin finish, and an almost black hue, the spectrum in marshland is a high quality aluminium blind with plenty to offer in terms of both style and usability. This is a sturdy, metal blind made up of slats that are easily adjustable to filter the light in or out. Place the marshland in utility room to create a statement window feature in a usually under-decorated room, or create a striking entrance by using it in the hallway of your home.

products.title: Spectrum, Tara - Venetian Blind
products.description: The tara is a high quality venetian blind from the functional spectrum range, where aluminium slats are easily moved and tilted to allow more or less light in. The pale mint shade, with its soft satin finish, will add peace and serenity to any room it's hung in. Place in a contemporary kitchen to temper chocolate browns and dark woods; or add a refreshing look to a neutral hallway or landing, alongside creams or whites.

products.title: Spectrum, Ronchi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Spectrum's ronchi combines orangey yellow with a gloss finish, resulting in a standout blind that is both attention-grabbing and light-catching. Yet if you need a little less light, it's easily blocked out by simply adjusting the slats using the blind's matching cords. Make a statement in the kitchen by teaming the bright ronchi with white walls and matching accents. Or place in the playroom, where easy-to-clean durability is a must and fun, bold colour is almost as crucial - the kids will simply love it.

products.title: Spectrum, Fawn - Venetian Blind
products.description: The palest of pale browns, the creamy spectrum fawn is pretty and discreet, making it the perfect neutral shade. Use the adjustable aluminium slats to control the light entering your home, and enjoy how the light bounces subtly off the pretty gloss finish. Partner the fawn with mocha browns or rich plums for an amazingly striking colour contrast that will bring warmth and cosiness to your living room or dining room; or use as a complementary neutral in a more functional room such as the utility room or downstairs cloakroom.

products.title: Spectrum, Kangaroo - Venetian Blind
products.description: Almost green, but not quite, the spectrum kangaroo is unique shade of grey, with a satin finish and gentle gleam. The slim aluminium slats are controlled easily by the matching pull-cord to allow the outside light in or keep it out. For a different take on classic grey, place the kangaroo in the home office, and offset it with a dazzling white on the walls, and brushed silver accents. This would also make a striking colour scheme in a dining room or kitchen.

products.title: Spectrum, Sapling - Venetian Blind
products.description: A rich, tea-coloured beige, the spectrum sapling adds both modesty and depth to any dcor scheme. And with easily adjustable aluminium slats, controlled by colour-coordinated pull-cords, this is a practical choice as well as an attractive one. Utilise the soft peachiness of the sapling to complement darker browns or brighter shades of peach, for a harmonised colour scheme in your bedroom or living room, where luxury living and a relaxing atmosphere is your top priority.

products.title: Spectrum, Eagle - Venetian Blind
products.description: You'll need to be eagle-eyed to catch this subtle colour, as the spectrum eagle was made to blend beautifully amongst stronger shades. The shiny gloss of this blind does catch the light though, as it filters through the gaps of your open eagle blind. When closed however, you can block the light out, so simply adjust according to your needs. Use in the hallway to add just a hint of colour amongst white walls, or settle amongst deeper, darker greys for a gentle monochrome look in the office or lounge.

products.title: Spectrum, Mercury - Venetian Blind
products.description: A soft dove grey, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum mercury combines contemporary style with all the robustness that comes with the sturdy aluminium slats, which can be easily adjusted to let light in or keep it out. Create a light, discreet look in the living room by using the mercury to complement whites and even lighter greys. Or go for style and sophistication in the dining room, by pairing with a deep navy and dazzling whites to offset each other beautifully.

products.title: Spectrum, Akaroa - Venetian Blind
products.description: The akaroa blind from the spectrum range provides a creamy light brown, with a soft satin finish, that will complement so many shades in your home. High quality slats and fittings make this choice not only aesthetically pleasing, but practical as well. Coordinate the akaroa with deep chocolate hues and light, pretty creams for a kitchen colour scheme that might just leave you feeling a little hungry.

products.title: Roma, Peony - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of roma peony is that it takes the traditional deep purples that you associate with days gone by, and brings it right up to date with a subtle infusion you can't quite put your finger on. It's all about taking things in an exciting new direction, so why not just embrace it and see where it leads?If you want to create a space you will never want to leave, there's no better way to do it than by mixing in black finishing touches.

products.title: Roma, Belize - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you who love contemporary colours that put the electricity in the air we give you roma belize. It's a chic and stylish colour that will welcome you through the door, pour you a glass, and invite you to put your feet up. It's exactly the homely touch that you've been waiting for. If you want to be able to reimagine your decor you need to give your ideas the freedom to ebb and flow. Take the time to think about how you want to do things differently, and before you know it you'll be relaxing in a room you've instantly fallen in love with.

products.title: Roma, Sage - Roller Blind
products.description: In a pretty shade of sage green, to match its name, the roma sage is refreshingly sweet. No bright limes or deep forests here, just simple, unassuming colour, perfect for brightening up any room. Fill a kitchen with a natural yet colourful glow by including the sage in your decor. Add matching green tones as well as pretty, pale creams, opting for some natural, light woods too. Pastels make for a lovely, relaxing look, which is exactly what you need in your kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Persian Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: In perfect purple, the roma in persian pastel is a simple yet unusual blind. A distinctive choice of colour, purple is usually seen in deep, eye-catching shades, yet this has a more understated look to it that might appeal even to those who aren't usually purple enthusiasts. Team the persian pastel with pale dove greys and keep the look simple yet attractive. Include stripes or checks for a contemporary look, or pretty florals for a more elegant and traditional style.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The sweet duck egg of roma's aqua haze makes for a lovely accent to any window. The colour really comes into its own when set against the outside sunlight, and it provides privacy without blocking the light out altogether. For some country chic, pair with pretty floral curtains in your dining room or place against white walls and pine units in a kitchen to truly brighten things up. The pale colour also makes this the ideal blind for small utility rooms or bathrooms that don't get a lot of natural light.

products.title: Roma, Sunrise - Roller Blind
products.description: Offsetting a range of colours and hues is what roma sunrise does best. It adds a warm and soothing glow to any setting, and does it all in a way that ensures you never run the risk of overpowering the existing decor. Just the ticket when you want to breathe new life into things. Taking a step back and thinking about what you want to bring to the fore is the best way to introduce sunrise to your bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Monza - Roller Blind
products.description: The courageous scarlet of the roma monza is both cheery and daring, and not for the shy and retiring room. The high quality, durable fabric leaves nothing to be desired, as it makes for the perfect, hassle-free, lasting blind. Be brave and use the monza as a focal point in a sleek, grey and black colour schemed living room or bedroom. You might also find that it makes the perfect finishing touch for a white utility room or neutral hallway.

products.title: Roma, Primrose - Roller Blind
products.description: True to its name, the roma primrose is a soft and pretty yellow, steering away from less delicate lemons and mustards into a more subtle and delicate piece. The sweetness of the shade hides a strong and sturdy fabric, useful for the hustle and bustle of busy family life. Go for an unusual but attractive colour scheme in the bathroom by opting for soft yellows and off-whites rather than the usual blues and teals.

products.title: Roma, Bahia - Roller Blind
products.description: Please the nature lovers in your home with the roma in bahia. This rich, natural green will add a contemporary yet eco look to any room, offering privacy and filtering out unwanted sunlight at the same time. Complement the bahia with darker shades of green, with some balancing browns and neutrals thrown in there for good measure. This blind will make a striking addition to a dark, moody dining room, or a bright, white office space.

products.title: Roma, Subtle - Roller Blind
products.description: In the loveliest of summer pinks, the roma subtle is as understated as its name suggests. The vintage pink tone is pretty and versatile, whilst the roma fabric is high quality and will certainly stand the test of time. Pair the subtle with soft dove greys for a somewhat retro look in the master bedroom, adding shabby chic accessories to keep the scheme bang on trend. Add luxe with faux furs and silver accessories, keeping comfort in mind as your top priority.

products.title: Roma, Tuscan Rose - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma tuscan rose couldn't be better named. Its dusky pink tone is as warm as it is pretty, and the vintage look will appeal to many different tastes. The papery feel of the roma fabric is pleasant to touch, though the material itself is strong and durable. Give a delicate look to a traditional dining room, pairing the tuscan rose with dark, polished woods and palest pink walls. This look would also work well in a guest or master bedroom, or even in the living room for a relaxing atmosphere.

products.title: Roma, Heatwave - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma heatwave allows you to lose yourself in a world of dreamy pinks that will have you thinking about all the exciting avenues you could take you decor in. The lightweight fabric moves gently in the breeze, whilst the electricity of the colour gives you plenty of food for thought. Introduce heatwave to the kitchen when you're cooking up a feast with this one of a kind shade and you'll find the spark of inspiration you've been looking for.

products.title: Roma, Bronco - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutrals don't have to be boring, you know. In fact, the roma bronco is far from it. This delicate brown works well as a soft accent to other, deeper colours, or as a standalone shade in its own right. Set the bronco against cream walls and light-coloured furniture for a light and airy bedroom, or use to complement dark-coloured woods and deep browns in a dusky, moody dining room. It will also work well as a window covering for a hallway or utility room, where no real colour scheme is in play.

products.title: Roma, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: This roma is natural by name, and natural by nature. This creamy off-white shade will allow plenty of light to penetrate through into the room, while still offering plenty of privacy when needed, meaning that you could have this blind closed all the time if need be. An excellent choice for rooms needing both privacy and light, such as a bathroom or bedroom, this shade will match pretty much any colour scheme.

products.title: Roma, Deep Fossil - Roller Blind
products.description: With its home in charcoal grey, but one foot in the blue camp, the twilight-inspired deep fossil from the popular roma collection, is both strong and pretty as a picture. The sturdy fabric displays a block colour, adding further to the monochrome chic of this piece. Include the deep fossil in a navy and grey colour scheme, perhaps in a teenager's bedroom spattered with silver, or in a home office, with white accents to make the blues and greys truly pop.

products.title: Roma, Mischka - Roller Blind
products.description: Add some refinement to a room with the roma mischka. This delicate off-white provides privacy when you need it, but still allows the light to penetrate through. The lightweight but hardy, canvas-feel fabric is all you need for a simple, no-fuss window covering. Just like its sister colour, white, the mischka will go with just about any colour scheme. It can look particularly appealing amongst pretty florals and light-coloured woods, making it the perfect addition to a country-style bedroom or bathroom.

products.title: Roma, Scorpion - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in scorpion is barely there, offering up a subtle accent to bolder brights and heavier tones. The pale colour is modern and in vogue, reminiscent of the clean hues of scandinavian dcor, and the hardy fabric holds its own and controls the light. Blended with whites, blacks, and darker greys, this blind creates a fresh, clean look, yet is equally as effective when used as a neutral amongst bold reds, bright oranges and yellows, or deep, rich purples.

products.title: Roma, Gallery - Roller Blind
products.description: Not quite white, but without the muted feel of cream, the roma gallery is a beautifully understated blind. Its pale translucency allows plenty of light through, even when closed, whilst its hardy but lightweight material still allows privacy and durability. Couple with pretty florals for a country chic look, or with rich browns and dark woods for a clean, sophisticated appearance. The gallery would make a beautiful addition to any room, in particular a neutral-coloured living room, light and airy bedroom, or a rich, dark style home office.

products.title: Roma, Mushroom - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in mushroom is the classic neutral. In an unassuming natural beige, it works as an attractive canvas for the rest of your decor. The fabric is durable and high-quality, as is the entire roma range, and is a worthy investment for a long-lasting window dressing. Pair the mushroom with fellow naturals, using everything from barely-there biscuits to delicious chocolate browns. Ensure at least part of the decor features strong colours with which to contrast against this natural tone, and include woods and wickers for a rustic feel.

products.title: Roma, Alto - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft beige of the roma alto is a perfect neutral that will work with clean, modern dcor or with traditional country chic. The fabric is opaque enough to block out bright light, but delicate enough to still let some light filter through. Team this pale taupe roller-blind with dark browns, deep reds, or cool blues for beautiful colour combinations, ideal for your living room, home office, or bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: Dusky is as dusky does in the evening-inspired roma dusk. This lovely mid-grey will offset a wide range of decor themes and colour schemes and, most importantly, will offer high quality and long-lasting durability. For monochrome chic, paint a feature wall in your guest bedroom a matching grey tone, then hang the dusk on an opposing wall painted in stark white. Accessorise with matching greys, darker charcoals, and midnight blacks, adding a splash of vibrant red or luscious pink if you can't bear to be totally without colour.

products.title: Fortune, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in fortune green is a subtle, blue-teal shade with a wonderfully oceanic look to it. Typical of roma fabric, the material is supple yet strong, making for a high quality blind that lasts. Opt for a lovely seaside theme in your bedroom by matching the fortune green to shabby chic accessories, bleached woods, and similar blues and greens. Go one step further and add seashells and coastal pictures too.

products.title: Ecowood, Saddle Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Saddle satin is the latest addition to their celebrated ecowood range. With a gentle cream that sits gently in the background you'll have the perfect compliment to the bolder colours that really bring your home to life. No matter what you have in mind the secret is to let your creativity run wild. Don't put limits on it; think about how you can get dark greys into the mix and how satin will allow them to take centre stage.

products.title: Wow Factor, Brushed Azure - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in brushed azure is a muted silver with just the faintest hint of blue and it will rest discreetly against your window frame. Control the light in the room easily by using the pull-cords to adjust the position of the aluminium slats, moving and tilting them at will. The brushed azure will provide any window with a hushed metallic look so that bolder features in the room can take centre stage.

products.title: Wow Factor, Harmony Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: The gorgeous bronze-gold of the wow factor harmony star is eye-catching and pronounced, without being overly bold, and its shimmering glitter is discreet, catching the light - and the eye - whenever the light hits it. Add quirky luxury to your living room by placing the harmony star against deep chocolates and cappuccino creams, letting the blind take centre stage. Or let it claim the limelight in a neutral hallway or landing instead, to add a little sparkle as you get home.

products.title: Wow Factor, Brushed Platinum - Venetian Blind
products.description: Metallic and eye-catching, the wow factor in brushed platinum combines functional utilitarianism with a subtle, luxury sheen, on a blind whose aluminium slats are easily adjusted to allow for changes in light and privacy needs. Complement a blue colour scheme in the home office or guest bedroom, accenting with matching ornaments, or simply use to add a metallic neutral to a bold, bright dining room, den, or living room, where cosy greens or deep plum purples might take centre stage.

products.title: Wow Factor, Carmela Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in carmela star is a soft, barely-there gold with gently shimmering glitter, on firm aluminium slats, creating a pretty, metallic effect. When closed, enjoy all the privacy and shelter of the dark, but when open, light will seep through in varying amounts, depending on your positioning of the slats. Pair with browns and golds for a luxurious feel in the living or dining room, or use as a standout statement feature in your bedroom, set against white walls.
